Package com.iciql

iciql (pronounced "icicle") is a Java JDBC SQL statement generator and simple object mapper

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DbUpgrader Interface which defines a class to handle table changes based on model versions.
Filter Represents the WHERE clause of a query.
Iciql A class that implements this interface can be used as a database table.
Iciql.EnumId Interface for using the EnumType.ENUMID enumeration mapping strategy.
SQLDialect This interface defines points where iciql can build different statements depending on the database used.
Token Classes implementing this interface can be used as a token in a statement.
UpdateColumn Classes implementing this interface can be used as a declaration in an update statement.
 

Class Summary
Constants Iciql constants.
Db This class represents a connection to a database.
DbInspector Class to inspect a model and a database for the purposes of model validation and automatic model generation.
DbUpgrader.DefaultDbUpgrader The default database upgrader.
DbVersion A system table to track database and table versions.
Define This class provides utility methods to define primary keys, indexes, and set the name of the table.
Function This class provides static methods that represents common SQL functions.
Query<T> This class represents a query.
QueryBetween<T,A> This class represents a "between y and z" condition.
QueryCondition<T,A> This class represents a query with an incomplete condition.
QueryJoin<T> This class represents a query with a join.
QueryJoinCondition<T,A> This class represents a query with join and an incomplete condition.
QueryWhere<T> This class represents a query with a condition.
RuntimeToken Represents a traditional PreparedStatment fragment like "id=?, name=?".
SQLDialectDefault Default implementation of an SQL dialect.
SQLDialectDerby Derby database dialect.
SQLDialectH2 H2 database dialect.
SQLDialectHSQL HyperSQL database dialect.
SQLDialectMySQL MySQL database dialect.
SQLDialectPostgreSQL PostgreSQL database dialect.
SQLStatement This class represents a parameterized SQL statement.
TableDefinition<T> A table definition contains the index definitions of a table, the field definitions, the table name, and other meta data.
TableDefinition.IndexDefinition The meta data of an index.
TableInspector Class to inspect the contents of a particular table including its indexes.
TestCondition<A> This class represents an incomplete condition.
UpdateColumnIncrement<T,A> This class represents "SET column = (column + x)" in an UPDATE statement.
UpdateColumnSet<T,A> This class represents "SET column = value" in an UPDATE statement.
ValidationRemark A validation remark is a result of running a model validation.
 

Enum Summary
Iciql.EnumType Enumeration representing how to map a java.lang.Enum to a column.
Iciql.IndexType Enumeration defining the four index types.
ValidationRemark.Level The validation message level.
 

Exception Summary
IciqlException Iciql wraps all exceptions with this class.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Iciql.IQColumn Annotation to define a column.
Iciql.IQEnum Annotation to define how a java.lang.Enum is mapped to a column.
Iciql.IQIgnore Annotation to define an ignored field.
Iciql.IQIndex An index annotation.
Iciql.IQIndexes Annotation to specify multiple indexes.
Iciql.IQSchema An annotation for a schema.
Iciql.IQTable Annotation to define a table.
Iciql.IQVersion An annotation for an iciql version.
 

Package com.iciql Description

iciql (pronounced "icicle") is a Java JDBC SQL statement generator and simple object mapper
